# Herbert Bay - AI Pioneer, Entrepreneur & Computer Vision Expert

> Personal website of Herbert Bay - Entrepreneur, Investor, Computer Vision Expert, Machine Learning Pioneer, and Adventurer

## About

Herbert Bay is a Swiss computer scientist known for his groundbreaking work in computer vision and artificial intelligence. He is the lead-inventor of the SURF (Speeded-Up Robust Features) algorithm, which has been cited nearly 40,000 times in scientific publications.

## Key Achievements

- **SURF Algorithm**: Lead-inventor of the Speeded-Up Robust Features algorithm (cited ~40,000 times)
- **ECCV Koenderink Prize 2016**: Awarded for fundamental contributions in computer vision that stood the test of time
- **CVIU Most Cited Paper Award 2011**: Recognition for highly cited research contributions
- **Top 200 Most Prominent Personalities**: Featured in Who Is Who in Zurich (2010)
